data.title: Splash House Festival Essentials & More!
data.meta_description: Get ready for Splash House in Palm Springs! Discover the must-have essentials for the ultimate poolside music festival experience this August.
data.text:
The Splash House Vibe & What to Expect

What: A three-day poolside music festival focused on electronic, house, and disco music. Expect lots of splashing in floatie-filled pools, dancing poolside, and general revelry.

When: August 9-11, August 16-18. Pool parties run from noon to sundown on Saturday and Sunday. The after-hours parties are on Friday and Saturday.

Where: Pool parties are hosted at three Greater Palm Springs resorts: The Saguaro, Renaissance Palm Springs, and Margaritaville Resort. A shuttle transports music fans between venues. The after-hours show takes place at the Palm Springs Air Museum.

Poolside Acts: Acts include Alesso, Gorgon City, Green Velvet, The Blessed Madonna, Hugel, Nitti, Odd MOB & Omnom, Hypebeam, Ship Wrek, Solardo, TSHA, &Friends, Aimmia, Airwolf Paradise, Biianco, Bruno Furlan, Brux, Distant Matter, ESSEL, Joshwa, Life on Planets, LINSKA, Martin IKIN, Millik, Sunday Scaries, Tinzo + Jojo, TOBEHONEST, AC Slater, Chris Lorenzo, Dr. Fresch, Meduza, Patrick Topping, SG Lewis, Austin Millz, Biscits, Girl Math, LF System, Bijou, ClubAction, DJ Topgun, Ewan Mcvicar, Jaguar, Jengi, John Liwag, Ky William, Lavern, Maniacs, Moon Boots, Riordan, Salvatore Ganacci, Truth x Lies, Wenzday, and Wes Mills.

After-hours Show: From 9 p.m. to 2 a.m. on Friday and Saturday at the Palm Springs Air Museum. August 9-11 features FLY WITH US (AC Slater & Chris Lorenzo) and Duke Dumont. August 16-18 showcases John Summit and Disco Dom by Dombresky.

Tickets: General Admission tickets range from $96-$235 for daytime pool parties. Combo passes range from $285-$1,102, including pool parties and after-hours shows. General admission for after-hours events is $96, or $144 for VIP. For more info, click here.

Essentials for the Ultimate Splash House Experience

Stay Cool and Protected: Palm Springs in August means intense heat. Protect your skin with high-SPF sunscreen, reapplying throughout the day. Staying hydrated is crucial, so bring a refillable water bottle to keep yourself refreshed at water stations.

Pool Party Gear: Stylish yet comfortable swimwear is essential for a pool party festival. Pair it with a chic cover-up for easy transitions between poolside lounging and dancing. Sunglasses are a must for eye protection and style.

Essential Accessories: Don’t forget earplugs to protect your hearing during high-decibel performances. A fanny pack or clear waterproof phone/wallet holder will keep your valuables safe and dry. Bring a portable fan or hand fan for relief from the heat. If you have an electric cooler, it’s a game-changer since ice machines often break down.

Quick Fixes for Hunger: Air Fryer and Snacks

When hunger strikes and your room is just a sidestep away, an air fryer can be your best friend. Perfect for heating up hot pockets, burritos, or any quick snack, it’s an absolute lifesaver for those in between meal cravings!

Keeping some easy-to-cook items on hand ensures you won’t miss a beat of the festival action.

After-Hours Magic: The Air Museum Soirée

When the sun sets, the party continues at the Palm Springs Air Museum. This iconic after-hours venue features top artists against the backdrop of vintage airplanes and the stunning San Jacinto mountains. Pack a light jacket or shawl for the cooler desert night and wear comfortable shoes for dancing the night away.

Extras to Elevate Your Experience

A waterproof phone case is essential for capturing memories without water damage. A small, portable fan can be a lifesaver during the hottest parts of the day. Bring a beach towel or blanket for lounging by the pool. A fanny pack or small backpack is perfect for carrying essentials hands-free, letting you fully immerse yourself in the festival vibes.

Embrace the Splash House Spirit

Splash House is a celebration of music, community, and the vibrant spirit of Palm Springs. Packing these essentials ensures you’ll enjoy every moment, from the poolside beats to the after-hours magic. Get ready to dive into an unforgettable experience and make this summer’s last stand one for the books.

See you in Palm Springs!
